mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.type_div,r.rv_num FROM review r JOIN member m ON r.reviewer = m.member_id JOIN product p ON r.reviewee = p.product_seller AND r.prod_num = p.product_num JOIN trade t ON r.reviewer = t.buy_mem_id AND t.prod_num = p.product_num WHERE reviewer = #{id} AND t.type_div = 'prod' ;

SELECT r.reviewer, r.reviewee, r.rv_content, m.member_pic, p.product_title, r.rv_score, p.product_num, p.product_pic, t.type_div,m.member_nickname FROM trade t JOIN product p ON t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller JOIN member m ON t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id JOIN review r ON r.reviewer = m.member_id AND r.prod_num = p.product_num WHERE reviewee = #{id} GROUP BY r.reviewer, r.reviewee, p.product_num;

SELECT t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id, t.sell_mem_id, t.type_div, p.product_title, t.prod_num, p.product_price, p.product_pic, p.product_cate, m.member_nickname FROM trade t JOIN product p ON t.prod_num = p.product_num JOIN member m ON t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id WHERE t.buy_mem_id = #{id} AND type_div = 'prod';

SELECT MAX(a.au_bidPrice) as au_bidPrice,a.au_num,a.au_sellerId, a.au_endPrice,a.au_pic,a.au_category,m.member_nickname,a.au_title,t.buy_mem_id FROM trade t JOIN auction a ON t.au_num = a.au_num and t.sell_mem_id = a.au_sellerId JOIN member m ON t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id WHERE t.buy_mem_id = #{id} AND type_div = 'au' group by a.au_num order by a.au_num desc;

SELECT r.ran_bidPrice as ran_bidPrice,r.ran_num,r.ran_sellerId, r.ran_Price,r.ran_pic,m.member_nickname, r.ran_title,t.buy_mem_id FROM trade t JOIN random r ON t.ran_num = r.ran_num and t.sell_mem_id = r.ran_sellerId JOIN member m ON t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id WHERE t.buy_mem_id = #{id} AND type_div = 'ran' group by r.ran_num order by r.ran_num;

select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id,t.sell_mem_id,t.type_div,p.product_title,t.prod_num, p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_cate,m.member_nickname from trade t join product p on t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num join member m on t.buy_mem_id = m.member_id where t.sell_mem_id = p.product_seller and t.prod_num = p.product_num and type_div = 'prod';
mapper.insert: insert into review( reviewee, reviewer, rv_score, rv_content, prod_num) values(#{reviewee}, #{reviewer}, #{rv_score}, #{rv_content},#{prod_num});
mapper.select: select avg(rv_score) from review group by reviewee having reviewee = #{id}

select ran_num,ran_price,ran_endTime,ran_sellerId,ran_buyerId,ran_pic,ran_maxPp,ran_title,ran_content,ran_bidPrice,ran_status from random where ran_buyerId = #{id} and ran_num is not null and ran_bidPrice != 0 group by ran_num order by ran_num desc;

select au_num, au_startPrice, au_endTime, au_sellerId, au_buyerId, max(au_bidPrice)as au_bidPrice, au_endPrice, au_pic, au_status, au_title,au_content, au_category from auction where au_buyerId = #{id} and au_num is not null and au_bidPrice != 0 group by au_num order by au_num desc;

select au_num, au_startPrice, au_endTime, au_sellerId, au_buyerId, max(au_bidPrice)as au_bidPrice, au_endPrice, au_pic, au_status, au_title,au_content, au_category from auction where au_sellerId = #{id} and au_num is not null group by au_num order by au_num desc;

select f.product_num, f.member_id, p.product_title,p.product_price,p.product_pic,p.product_seller,p.product_readcount, p.product_favorite from favorite f join product p on f.product_num = p.product_num where f.member_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where member_id = #{member_id} and product_num = #{product_num}
mapper.select: select t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id, t.sell_mem_id, t.prod_num, t.prod_sell_date, t.type_div, t.product_title, p.product_pic,p.product_status,p.product_price from trade t join product p on t.prod_num = p.product_num where t.sell_mem_id = #{id};

select distinct t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id, t.sell_mem_id, t.au_num, t.prod_sell_date, t.type_div, t.product_title, a.au_pic,a.au_status,a.au_endPrice,a.au_endTime from trade t join auction a on t.au_num = a.au_num where t.sell_mem_id = #{id};

select distinct t.t_num, t.buy_mem_id, t.sell_mem_id, t.ran_num, t.prod_sell_date, t.type_div, t.product_title, r.ran_price, r.ran_maxPp, r.ran_bidPrice,r.ran_pic from trade t join random r on t.ran_num = r.ran_num and t.buy_mem_id = r.ran_buyerId where t.sell_mem_id = #{id};
